1.title: Wonderful World of Bill Berloni

episode of.title: From Wags to Riches with Bill Berloni (TV Series 2015– )

1.plot: Ever wondered what it's like to live with 26 dogs, two horses, one pony, a cat, a macaw, two pigs, a llama and a very grumpy donkey? Well meet Bill Berloni who does - a modern-day Dr. Dolittle - who trains rescued animals for the stage and screen.

2.title: Bad Chico

episode of.title: From Wags to Riches with Bill Berloni (TV Series 2015– )

2.plot: Bill hits the road with just two of his 26 strong dog menagerie as Bowdie and Lexie get ready to take to the stage in a brand new show and we meet Chico - the naughtiest dog in Bill's life and of course - his favorite dog!

3.title: Donkey Day!

episode of.title: From Wags to Riches with Bill Berloni (TV Series 2015– )

3.plot: Bill gets a last minute call to train three of his 26 dogs for a music video in New York City, a rescue at the Humane Society gets the chance for a new life and we meet Percy the grumpiest donkey in the world.

4.title: Adoption Day!

episode of.title: From Wags to Riches with Bill Berloni (TV Series 2015– )

4.plot: Bill and the New York Humane Society spruce up some desperate rescue dogs for Broadway Barks - a dog adoption gala hosted by actress, Bernadette Peters. Will Titus the Saint Bernard, finally find a home?
